title: Geographical Information Query System
responsibilities: Developed an end-to-end language-driven agent utilizing open-source large language models (LLMs) and Google Maps API to dynamically handle spoken user queries in real-time mobility contexts; implemented using React, Django and LangChain
Implemented a RAG token model and conducted comparative performance analyses of open-source GPT variants, focusing on optimizing responses in travel-specific scenarios.

title: PlayBack
responsibilities: Collaborated with 5-member group and developed a comprehensive full-stack film community website, integrating features of blog search, video streaming, film library, and reviews; used React for frontend, Node JS for backend and NoSQL database.
Created a data pipeline for processing and analysing student progress, queries and test scores, automating classification and forwarding student profiles to mentors, saving significant manual time.
Designed and implemented a robust RESTful API from scratch, leveraging GraphQL and Swagger to enhance API functionality and interactivity.

title: CollabTree
responsibilities: Led a team to build a full-stack freelancing website with blog sharing; includes features of job search, blogging profile, and private messaging. Built using Django, Bootstrap, SQL database and WebSocket for messaging.
